name: 大數據分析理論與實務
goals: Learn basic algorithms for problem solving
syllabus:
Topic 1. Introduction

Topic 2. The Python Data Science Stack

Topic 3. Statistical Visualizations

Topic 4. Working with Big Data Frameworks – Hadoop

Topic 5. Working with Big Data Frameworks - Spark

Topic 6. Data Preparation

Topic 7. Association Rule Mining

Topic 8. Decision Tree

Topic 9. Artificial Neural Network (1)

Topic 10. Artificial Neural Network (2)

Topic 11. Cluster Analysis

Topic 12. Bayesian Network

Topic 13. Multivariate Analysis (1)

Topic 14. Multivariate Analysis (2)

Topic 15. Time Series Analysis

Topic 16. Case Analysis of Big Data Analytics (1)

Topic 17. Case Analysis of Big Data Analytics (2)

Topic 18. Final Examination

methodologies.note: The big data analytics will be introduced in the lectures.
The theories and practical applicaitons will be discussed with students.
The algorithms and empirical cases will be realized through projects.

grading.note: On time submission of exercises and projects
Final examination will conver all the topics being introduced in the course.
Please inform the lecturer in advance for the abscense. 5% of total score will be deducted for one time of no show without prior notification.

prerequisite: ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
